author: J. Edward Moreno
title: Protesters in Richmond call for Virginia to reopen
description: Protesters in Richmond are calling on Democratic Gov. Ralph Northam to reopen the state, joining a slew of groups calling for an end of "stay at home" orders in the country.ReOpen Virginia, a conservative group, or...
content:
Protesters in Richmond are calling on Democratic Gov. Ralph Northam to reopen the state, joining a slew of groups calling for an end of stay at home orders in the country. 
ReOpen Virginia, a conservative group, organized a drive-in protest outside the Virgi… [+2240 chars]
